mapper.select: select category_code, count( category_code ) "countProduct" from product where shop_code = #{shopCode} group by category_code order by category_code
mapper.insert: insert into category values(#{shopCode},(select NVL2(max(category_code),max(category_code) + 1,1 ) "categoryCode" from category where shop_code=#{shopCode}),#{categoryName})
mapper.update: update category set category_name=#{categoryName} where shop_code=#{shopCode} and category_code=#{categoryCode}
mapper.delete: delete from category where shop_code=#{shopCode} and category_code=#{categoryCode}
mapper.select: select count(category_name) from category where shop_code=#{shopCode} and category_name=#{categoryName}
